name: testCreateJsonSchema

    level: "error"
    schema: {"loadingURI":"#","pointer":""}
    instance: {"pointer":""}
    domain: "validation"
    keyword: "required"
    required: ["token"]
    missing: ["token"]

  Actual: {"reason":"Bad credentials"}
